description: Source: The German Socio-Economic Panel Study (SOEP): SOEP Core Study Life Course 2014
description_de: Source: TNS Infratest Sozialforschung. 2014. SOEP 2014 - Erhebungsinstrumente 2014 (Welle 31) des Sozio-oekonomischen Panels: Lebenslauffragebogen, Altstichproben. SOEP Survey Papers 237: Series A. Berlin: DIW/SOEP

name: pas0200m
text: How often do the following things usually happen between you and [name mother]?
text_de: Im Folgenden moechte ich Dich ein paar Dinge zu Dir und Deiner Familie fragen. Wir fangen an mit Fragen zu Deiner Mutter [Name]. Es gibt keine richtigen und falschen Antworten, bitte sag mir einfach, wie Du darueber denkst. Wie haeufig kommen folgende Dinge typischerweise zwischen Dir und Deiner Mutter [Name] vor?
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother shows you that she likes you.
text_de: Deine Mutter zeigt Dir, dass sie Dich gerne hat.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother praises you.
text_de: Deine Mutter lobt Dich.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother tries to cheer you up when you are sad.
text_de: Deine Mutter troestet Dich, wenn Du traurig bist.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother gives you advice regarding your personal problems.
text_de: Deine Mutter unterstuetzt Dich, wenn Du ein Problem hast.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother punishes you when you do something against her will.
text_de: Deine Mutter bestraft Dich, wenn Du etwas gegen ihren Willen tust.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother is disappointed and sad because you misbehaved.
text_de: Deine Mutter ist enttaeuscht und traurig, wenn Du Dich schlecht benommen hast.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother makes it clear to you that you are not to break the rules or question her decisions.
text_de: Deine Mutter gibt Dir zu verstehen, dass Du Dich ihren Anordnungen nicht widersetzen sollst.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother yells at you because you did something wrong.
text_de: Deine Mutter schreit Dich an, wenn Du etwas falsch gemacht hast.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother scolds you because she is angry at you.
text_de: Deine Mutter beschimpft Dich, wenn sie wuetend auf Dich ist.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: When you make new friends, your mother talks to you about them.
text_de: Wenn Du neue Freunde hast, unterhaelt sich Deine Mutter mit Dir ueber diese Freunde.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: When you make new friends, your mother gets to know them soon thereafter.
text_de: Wenn Du neue Freunde hast, lernt Deine Mutter diese auch bald kennen.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother threatens you with a punishment but does not actually follows through.
text_de: Deine Mutter droht Dir eine Strafe an, straft Dich dann aber doch nicht.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200m
text: Your mother finds it hard to set and keep consistent rules for you.
text_de: Deiner Mutter faellt es schwer, in ihrer Erziehung konsequent zu sein (z.B. auf die Einhaltung von vereinbarten Regeln oder Verbote zu achten).
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

text: How often do the following things usually happen between you and [name father]?
text_de: Nun moechte ich Dir noch ein paar Fragen zu Deinem Vater [Name] stellen. Auch hier gibt es keine richtigen oder falschen Antworten, sag mir einfach, wie Du darueber denkst. Wie haeufig kommen folgende Dinge typischerweise zwischen Dir und Deinem Vater [Name] vor?
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father shows you that he likes you.
text_de: Dein Vater zeigt Dir, dass er Dich gerne hat.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father praises you.
text_de: Dein Vater lobt Dich.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father tries to cheer you up when you are sad.
text_de: Dein Vater troestet Dich, wenn Du traurig bist.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father gives you advice regarding your personal problems.
text_de: Dein Vater unterstuetzt Dich, wenn Du ein Problem hast.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father punishes you when you do something against his will.
text_de: Dein Vater bestraft Dich, wenn Du etwas gegen seinen Willen tust.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father is disappointed and sad because you misbehaved.
text_de: Dein Vater ist enttaeuscht und traurig, wenn Du Dich schlecht benommen hast.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father makes it clear to you that you are not to break the rules or question his decisions.
text_de: Dein Vater gibt Dir zu verstehen, dass Du Dich seinen Anordnungen nicht widersetzen sollst.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father yells at you because you did something wrong.
text_de: Dein Vater schreit Dich an, wenn Du etwas falsch gemacht hast.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father scolds you because he is angry at you.
text_de: Dein Vater beschimpft Dich, wenn er wuetend auf Dich ist.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: When you make new friends, your father talks to you about them.
text_de: Wenn Du neue Freunde hast, unterhaelt sich Dein Vater mit Dir ueber diese Freunde.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: When you make new friends, your father gets to know them soon thereafter.
text_de: Wenn Du neue Freunde hast, lernt Dein Vater diese auch bald kennen.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father threatens you with a punishment but does not actually follows through.
text_de: Dein Vater droht Dir eine Strafe an, straft Dich dann aber doch nicht.
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200f
text: Your father finds it hard to set and keep consistent rules for you.
text_de: Deinem Vater faellt es schwer, in seiner Erziehung konsequent zu sein (z.B. auf die Einhaltung von vereinbarten Regeln oder Verbote zu achten).
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: pas0200g
text: How often do the following things usually happen between you and [name stepfather]?
text_de: Wie haeufig kommen folgende Dinge typischerweise zwischen Dir und [Name des Stiefvaters] vor?
description: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3
description_de: Source: Schmahl, F., Wilhelm, B., Friedrich, S., Wendt, E.-V., Thoennissen, C., & Walper, S. (2012). Scales Manual of the German Family Panel. Wave 1 to 3

name: tsp0100
text: Do you (as parents) try to dress the twins as similarly as possible? [IF age0110t > 9] If the twins are older, think back to when they were children.
text_de: Versuchen Sie (als Eltern) die Zwillinge so gleich wie moeglich zu kleiden? [IF age0110t > 9] Wenn die Zwillinge schon aelter sind, denken Sie bitte an die Kindheit der Zwillinge zurueck.
description: Source: Item developed for TwinLife
description_de: Source: Fuer TwinLife entwickeltes Item

name: tsp0101
text: Up to what age (of the twins) did they do that?
text_de: Bis zu welchem Alter (der Zwillinge) haben Sie das getan?
description: Source: Item developed for TwinLife
description_de: Source: Fuer TwinLife entwickeltes Item

name: tsp0200
text: Do the twins (currently) share more or less the same hobbies and interests?
text_de: Teilen die Zwillinge (aktuell) in etwa die gleichen Hobbies und Interessen?
description: Source: Item developed for TwinLife
description_de: Source: Fuer TwinLife entwickeltes Item

name: tsp0300
text: How close would you say the twins are?
text_de: Was wuerden Sie sagen: Wie eng ist das Verhaeltnis der Zwillinge zueinander?
description: Source: Item developed for TwinLife
description_de: Source: Fuer TwinLife entwickeltes Item

name: tsp0400
text: [IF age0110t < 10] Are you sometimes unable to tell the twins apart? [IF age0110t >= 10] Were you sometimes unable to tell the twins apart in early childhood? If a new partner/stepparent states that they did not know the twins in early childhood, then please enter 'do not know'.
text_de: [IF age0110t < 10] Verwechseln Sie selbst die Zwillinge? [IF age0110t >= 10] Haben Sie selbst die Zwillinge im fruehen Kindesalter verwechselt? Sofern ein neuer Partner/Stiefelternteil angibt, die Zwillinge im Kindesalter noch nicht gekannt zu haben, dann bitte weiss nicht eingeben.
description: Source: Item developed for TwinLife
description_de: Source: Fuer TwinLife entwickeltes Item

name: dev0100
text: What about you?
text_de: Wie ist es bei Dir?
description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

name: dev0100
text: Would you say that you are NEVER angry, SOMETIMES angry or VERY OFTEN angry?
text_de: Wuerdest du sagen, dass du NIE wuetend bist, MANCHMAL wuetend bist oder GANZ OFT wuetend bist?
description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

name: dev0100
text: Would you say that you NEVER listen to your parents, SOMETIMES listen to your parents or VERY OFTEN listen to your parents?
text_de: Wuerdest Du sagen, dass du NIE auf Deine Eltern hoerst, MANCHMAL auf Deine Eltern hoerst oder GANZ OFT auf Deine Eltern hoerst?
description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

name: dev0100
text: Would you say that you NEVER have arguments with other children, SOMETIMES have arguments with other children or VERY OFTEN have arguments with other children.
text_de: Wuerdest Du sagen, dass Du Dich NIE mit anderen Kindern streitest, MANCHMAL mit anderen Kindern streitest, oder GANZ OFT mit anderen Kindern streitest?
description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

name: dev0100
text: Would you say that you NEVER cheat or lie, sometimes cheat or lie, or very often cheat or lie?
text_de: Wuerdest Du sagen, dass Du NIE mogelst oder luegst, MANCHMAL mogelst oder luegst, oder GANZ OFT mogelst oder luegst?
description: Source: Adapted from: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130
description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goodman, R., Meltzer, H., & Bailey, V. (1998). The Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire: A pilot study on the validity of the self-report version. European child & adolescent psychiatry, 7 (3), 125-130

name: sre0500
text: What about you and [name of other twin]?
text_de: Wie ist es bei Dir und [Name des anderen Zwillings]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: What about doing nice things like helping or doing favors for [name of other twin]? How often do you do these kind of things?
text_de: Manche Kinder tun fuer ihre Geschwister etwas Nettes wie z.B. ihnen zu helfen oder ihnen einen Gefallen zu tun. Wie oft tust Du solche netten Dinge fuer [Name des anderen Zwillings]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: Most children are affectionate with their brother or sister sometimes even though they fight at other times. How often are you physically affectionate with [name of other twin] (such as by hugging, kissing, holding hands)?
text_de: Manche Kinder gehen liebevoll mit ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester um, auch wenn sie manchmal streiten. Wie oft bist Du liebevoll/zaertlich zu [Name des anderen Zwillings], z.B. indem Du ihn/sie umarmst, kuesst oder seine/ihre Hand haeltst?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: How about if [name of other twin] is hurt or upset, how often do you try to make [target sibling] feel better?
text_de: Wie ist das, wenn [Name des anderen Zwillings] sich wehgetan hat oder traurig ist, wie oft versuchst Du [Name des anderen Zwillings] zu troesten?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: Some children share secrets with their brothers and sisters and other children don't. How often do you share secrets with [name of other twin]?
text_de: Kinder haben manchmal Geheimnisse. Wie oft erzaehlst Du [Name des anderen Zwillings] Deine Geheimnisse?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: Brothers and sisters sometimes cause trouble or start fights or arguments with one another, even if they love each other a lot. How often would you say that you start fights or cause trouble for [name of other twin]?
text_de: Brueder und Schwestern fangen manchmal einen Streit oder eine Rauferei miteinander an, auch wenn sie sich eigentlich sehr lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft zettelst Du einen Streit an oder bringst [Name des anderen Zwillings] in Schwierigkeiten?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: How often do you feel mad or angry at [name of other twin]?
text_de: Wie oft bist Du boese oder wuetend auf [Name des anderen Zwillings]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: Children sometimes hurt their brother or sister on purpose like by pushing, punching or hitting him or her. How often do you do these kind of things to [name of other twin]?
text_de: Kinder tun ihren Geschwistern manchmal absichtlich weh, indem sie sie z.B. schubsen, hauen oder kneifen. Wie oft machst Du so etwas bei [Name des anderen Zwillings]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: Some children are mean to their brothers or sisters sometimes, even if they really care about them. How often would you say you do things to [name of other twin] like tease, bug or call him or her names?
text_de: Manche Kinder sind manchmal gemein zu ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester, auch wenn sie ihn/sie wirklich lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft tust Du solche Dinge, wie [Name des anderen Zwillings] aergern, oder sie/ihn aufzuziehen?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: Many kids complain that their mothers aren't fair about how they treat them compared to how their mothers treat their brothers and sisters. How is this for you? How often do you feel that your mother treats [name of other twin] better than she treats you?
text_de: Manche Kinder beschweren sich darueber, dass ihre Muetter sie und ihren Bruder/ihre Schwester nicht gleich behandeln. Wie ist das bei Dir? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass Deine Mutter [Name des anderen Zwillings] besser behandelt als Dich?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: How about with your father? How often do you feel that he treats [name of other twin] better than he treats you?
text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass er [Name des anderen Zwillings] besser behandelt als Dich?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: How about with your mother? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your mother's attention or affection toward [name of other twin]?
text_de: Wie ist es mit Deiner Mutter? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn Deine Mutter [Name des anderen Zwillings] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500
text: How about with your father? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your father's attention or affection toward [name of other twin]?
text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn dein Vater [Name des anderen Zwillings] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500s
text: What about you and [name of other sibling]?
text_de: Wie ist es bei Dir und [Name des befragten Geschwisters einblenden]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500s
text: What about doing nice things like helping or doing favors for [name of sibling]? How often do you do these kind of things?
text_de: Manche Kinder tun fuer ihre Geschwister etwas Nettes wie z.B. ihnen zu helfen oder ihnen einen Gefallen zu tun. Wie oft tust Du solche netten Dinge fuer [Name des befragten Geschwisters]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500s
text: Most children are affectionate with their brother or sister sometimes even though they fight at other times. How often are you physically affectionate with [name of sibling] (such as by hugging, kissing, holding hands)?
text_de: Manche Kinder gehen liebevoll mit ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester um, auch wenn sie manchmal streiten. Wie oft bist Du liebevoll/zaertlich zu [Name des befragten Geschwisters], z.B. indem Du ihn/sie umarmst, kuesst oder seine/ihre Hand haeltst?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500s
text: How about if [name of sibling] is hurt or upset, how often do you try to make [target sibling] feel better?
text_de: Wie ist das, wenn [Name des befragten Geschwisters] sich wehgetan hat oder traurig ist, wie oft versuchst Du [Name des befragten Geschwisters] zu troesten?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500s
text: Some children share secrets with their brothers and sisters and other children don't. How often do you share secrets with [name of sibling]?
text_de: Kinder haben manchmal Geheimnisse. Wie oft erzaehlst Du [Name des befragten Geschwisters] Deine Geheimnisse?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500s
text: Brothers and sisters sometimes cause trouble or start fights or arguments with one another, even if they love each other a lot. How often would you say that you start fights or cause trouble for [name of sibling]?
text_de: Brueder und Schwestern fangen manchmal einen Streit oder eine Rauferei miteinander an, auch wenn sie sich eigentlich sehr lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft zettelst Du einen Streit an oder bringst [Name des befragten Geschwisters] in Schwierigkeiten?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500t
text: How about with your father? How often do you feel that he treats [name of twin 1] better than he treats you?
text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass er [Name Zwilling 1] besser behandelt als Dich?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500t
text: How about with your mother? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your mother's attention or affection toward [name of twin 1]?
text_de: Wie ist es mit Deiner Mutter? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn Deine Mutter [Name Zwilling 1] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500t
text: How about with your father? How often do you feel sort of jealous about your father's attention or affection toward [name of twin 1]?
text_de: Wie ist es mit Deinem Vater? Wie oft fuehlst Du so etwas wie Eifersucht, wenn dein Vater [Name Zwilling 1] Aufmerksamkeit oder Zuneigung schenkt?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: What about you and [name of other twin 2]?
text_de: Wie ist es bei Dir und [Name des Zwilling 2]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: What about doing nice things like helping or doing favors for [name of twin 2]? How often do you do these kind of things?
text_de: Manche Kinder tun fuer ihre Geschwister etwas Nettes wie z.B. ihnen zu helfen oder ihnen einen Gefallen zu tun. Wie oft tust Du solche netten Dinge fuer [Name Zwilling 2]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: Most children are affectionate with their brother or sister sometimes even though they fight at other times. How often are you physically affectionate with [name of twin 2] (such as by hugging, kissing, holding hands)?
text_de: Manche Kinder gehen liebevoll mit ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester um, auch wenn sie manchmal streiten. Wie oft bist Du liebevoll/zaertlich zu [Name Zwilling 2], z.B. indem Du ihn/sie umarmst, kuesst oder seine/ihre Hand haeltst?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: How about if [name of twin 2] is hurt or upset, how often do you try to make [target sibling] feel better?
text_de: Wie ist das, wenn [Name Zwilling 2] sich wehgetan hat oder traurig ist, wie oft versuchst Du [Name Zwilling 2] zu troesten?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: Some children share secrets with their brothers and sisters and other children don't. How often do you share secrets with [name of twin 2]?
text_de: Kinder haben manchmal Geheimnisse. Wie oft erzaehlst Du [Name Zwilling 2] Deine Geheimnisse?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: Brothers and sisters sometimes cause trouble or start fights or arguments with one another, even if they love each other a lot. How often would you say that you start fights or cause trouble for [name of twin 2]?
text_de: Brueder und Schwestern fangen manchmal einen Streit oder eine Rauferei miteinander an, auch wenn sie sich eigentlich sehr lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft zettelst Du einen Streit an oder bringst [Name Zwilling 2] in Schwierigkeiten?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: How often do you feel mad or angry at [name of twin 2]?
text_de: Wie oft bist Du boese oder wuetend auf [Name Zwilling 2]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: Children sometimes hurt their brother or sister on purpose like by pushing, punching or hitting him or her. How often do you do these kind of things to [name of twin 2]?
text_de: Kinder tun ihren Geschwistern manchmal absichtlich weh, indem sie sie z.B. schubsen, hauen oder kneifen. Wie oft machst Du so etwas bei [Name Zwilling 2]?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: Some children are mean to their brothers or sisters sometimes, even if they really care about them. How often would you say you do things to [name of twin 2] like tease, bug or call him or her names?
text_de: Manche Kinder sind manchmal gemein zu ihrem Bruder/ihrer Schwester, auch wenn sie ihn/sie wirklich lieb haben. Was wuerdest Du sagen, wie oft tust Du solche Dinge, wie [Name Zwilling 2] aergern, oder sie/ihn aufzuziehen?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859

name: sre0500u
text: Many kids complain that their mothers aren't fair about how they treat them compared to how their mothers treat their brothers and sisters. How is this for you? How often do you feel that your mother treats [name of twin 2] better than she treats you?
text_de: Manche Kinder beschweren sich darueber, dass ihre Muetter sie und ihren Bruder/ihre Schwester nicht gleich behandeln. Wie ist das bei Dir? Wie oft hast Du das Gefuehl, dass Deine Mutter [Name Zwilling 2] besser behandelt als Dich?
description: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
description_de: Source: Boer, F., Westenberg, P. M., McHale, S. M., Updegraff, K. A., & Stocker, C. M. (1997). The factorial structure of the Sibling Relationship Inventory (SRI) in American and Dutch samples. Journal of Social and Personal Relationships, 14(6), 851-859
